credit_line: Gift of Starling W. Childs and Ward Cheney
title: Study: Begonia
medium: Pen and ink, brush and watercolor, graphite on yellow tracing paper
description: Vertical sheet depicting a begonia plant, including details of a leaf.  Graphite is used for shading, with light touches of green color on the stalks, as well as pale pink on the blossoms.
name: Drawing
